snippet: Ivan Ljubicic, who is about to play his last tournament, has encouraged other players to become involved in the game’s governance.
abstract: Profile of Ivan Ljubicic, 33-year-old Croatian tennis player who will retire from the ATP Tour after playing in the Monte Carlo Masters; Ljubicic has encouraged other players to become involved in the game’s governance.
lead_paragraph: Ivan Ljubicic, who is about to play his last tournament, has encouraged other players to become involved in the game’s governance.

headline.main: Setting the Tone for Tennis’s Much Bigger Stars
headline.print_headline: Last Event for an Ebbing Star Who Spurred the Superstars to Action
